description:
How fucking adorable is Reid?
Our shy guy was surprisingly open to the idea of man sex. And it may have had something to do with the fact that he didn't have to make the first move.
That was Carlton's job.
"You've never had sex with a guy?" I asked Reid. "No blow job, touching, nothing?"
"Nope," he said.
Carlton had told me on his last trip that he loves to give foot massages. Carlton loves feet.
What better way to calm Reid's nerves than to let him lay back and enjoy a nice foot rub?
And it worked to. Reid seemed really confident when it came time to slide his cock into Carlton's ass...
title: Reid & Carlton
